name: Intellivision Collection 2
storyline:
Tower of Doom
The Intellivision’s ambitious action RPG Tower of Doom comes to your Evercade. Take on an ever-changing dungeon as you seek treasure, fame and glory.

Cloudy Mountain
Gather your party and venture forth as this classic Intellivision dungeon crawler comes to Evercade. Can you recover the Crown of Kings?

Hover Force
The Intellivision’s tactical top-down helicopter shooter comes to Evercade. Blast terrorists with your lasers — but don’t forget to put out the fires with your water cannon!

Star Strike
The Intellivision adaptation of a famous sci-fi movie’s best scene is here on your Evercade. Bomb the five exhaust ports before it’s too late — or the Earth is toast!

Vectron
The Intellivision’s most creative strategic shooter comes to Evercade. Build your energy base with multidirectional shooting — but watch out for the enemies hampering your efforts!

Auto Racing
Take to the circuit with this Intellivision racing classic for Evercade. Challenge your best times solo, or compete against a friend for points.

Stadium Mud Buggies
Hit the dirt with this varied Intellivision offroad racer for your Evercade. Compete in nine different events solo, against the computer or against a friend!

Motocross
Time for two-wheeled Intellivision mayhem on your Evercade. Challenge three different courses — or design your own with the built-in track editor!

Mountain Madness Super Pro Skiing
Take to the slopes with this challenging Intellivision sports title for your Evercade. Ski down 32 built-in courses, take on the randomly generated “Helicopter Skiing” mode — or make your own mountain!

Super Pro Decathlon
One to four can play in this Intellivision multi-sports extravaganza for Evercade. Take on ten challenging events and compete for the title of The Greatest Athlete in the World.

Sharp Shot
In this Intellivision classic for Evercade, you’ll use just one button to throw footballs, blast aliens, sink ships and protect your treasure from monsters!

Reversi
The classic board game comes to Evercade, Intellivision-style. Surround your opponent’s pieces and capture territory — remember to go for the corners!
summary:
The Intellivision Collection 2 cartridge for Evercade features 12 beloved Intellivision games, including the legendary role-playing game Tower of Doom and classic dungeon crawler Cloudy Mountain.

- Tower of Doom
- Cloudy Mountain (untagged)
- Hover Force
- Star Strike
- Vectron
- Auto Racing
- Stadium Mud Buggies
- Motocross
- Mountain Madness Super Pro Skiing
- Super Pro Decathlon
- Sharp Shot
- Reversi
